LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_Club.label: 棍
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_Club.description: 最古老的人類武器，將敵人打擊至死，原始但有效。
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_Club.tools.handle.label: 柄
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_Club.tools.head.label: 棍頭
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_Ikwa.label: 短矛
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_Ikwa.description: 短柄上連接著長劍刃，設計上適合快速突刺敵人的要害。
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_Ikwa.tools.handle.label: 柄
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_Ikwa.tools.head.label: 端部
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_Ikwa.tools.edge.label: 刃鋒
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_Knife.label: 小刀
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_Knife.tools.handle.label: 刀柄
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_Knife.tools.blade.label: 刀身
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_Knife.tools.point.label: 刀尖
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_Spear.label: 長矛
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_Spear.description: 一把頂端裝有利器的長矛，用於在肉搏戰中刺向對手。
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_Spear.tools.shaft.label: shaft
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_Spear.tools.point.label: 刃尖
